title: Solution of the SU(2) Mandelstam Constraints
abstract: It is shown how the Mandelstam constraints for an $SU(2)$ pure lattice gauge theory with $3{\cal N}$ physical degrees of freedom may be solved completely in terms of $3{\cal N}$ Wilson and Polyakov loop variables and ${\cal N}-1$ gauge invariant discrete +/-1 variables, thus enabling a manifestly gauge invariant formulation of the theory.
